array.name: tips
array.item: Wipe your finger from left to right over the large album art to skip the current song.
Wipe your finger from right to left over the large album art to go to the previous song.
Wipe your finger from top down over the large album art to play/pause
Wipe your finger from the bottom up over the large album art to open the album detail view
Use multi touch gestures to zoom on the map on phones with Android 2.0 or newer.
Press the DPad in the map and use your finger to select several albums.
Long click on a playlist item shows the context menu.
Long click on the large album art shows the context menu.
Short click on the large album art shows the playlist.
Long click on an artist (in the artist list) lets you play all songs of an artist.
Long click on a genre (in the genre list) lets you play all songs of a genre.
Find songs on your device that are similar to a famous artist using the \'famous artist\' search.
Reset smart shuffling using \'clear playlist\'.
Enable scrobbling to last.fm in the settings dialog.
Move to the currently playing song in the space using the context menu (long click in playlist).
Wipe your finger on the zoom bar for faster and more precise control.
Activate gapless playback in the settings dialog if you feel disturbed by the gaps between the songs.
